description: This file defines a mock implementation of the WPEFramework::Exchange::IPowerManager interface for testing purposes. It declares mock methods for power management functions and manages mock instances per test case.

classes.name: PowerManagerMock
classes.description: A mock class implementing the WPEFramework::Exchange::IPowerManager interface for testing purposes. It provides methods for registering/unregistering notifications, controlling power states, and managing instance lifecycle.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks the registration of various power management notifications.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks the unregistration of various power management notifications.

methods.name: SetPowerState
methods.description: Mocks setting the power state of the device.

methods.name: GetPowerState
methods.description: Mocks retrieving the current and previous power states.

methods.name: GetThermalState
methods.description: Mocks obtaining the current thermal temperature.

methods.name: SetTemperatureThresholds
methods.description: Mocks setting temperature thresholds.

methods.name: GetTemperatureThresholds
methods.description: Mocks retrieving temperature thresholds.

methods.name: SetOvertempGraceInterval
methods.description: Mocks setting the overtemperature grace interval.

methods.name: GetOvertempGraceInterval
methods.description: Mocks retrieving the overtemperature grace interval.

methods.name: SetDeepSleepTimer
methods.description: Mocks setting the deep sleep timer.

methods.name: GetLastWakeupReason
methods.description: Mocks obtaining the last wakeup reason.

methods.name: GetLastWakeupKeyCode
methods.description: Mocks obtaining the last wakeup key code.

methods.name: Reboot
methods.description: Mocks executing a reboot request.

methods.name: SetNetworkStandbyMode
methods.description: Mocks setting the network standby mode.

methods.name: GetNetworkStandbyMode
methods.description: Mocks retrieving the network standby mode.

methods.name: SetWakeupSourceConfig
methods.description: Mocks configuring the wakeup source.

methods.name: GetWakeupSourceConfig
methods.description: Mocks retrieving the wakeup source configuration.

methods.name: GetPowerStateBeforeReboot
methods.description: Mocks obtaining the power state before reboot.

methods.name: AddPowerModePreChangeClient
methods.description: Mocks adding a client for power mode pre-change notifications.

methods.name: RemovePowerModePreChangeClient
methods.description: Mocks removing a client for power mode pre-change notifications.

methods.name: PowerModePreChangeComplete
methods.description: Mocks completing a power mode pre-change notification.

methods.name: DelayPowerModeChangeBy
methods.description: Mocks delaying the power mode change.

methods.name: void Delete(void)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: Exchange::IPowerManager * Get()
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: PowerManagerMock INTERFACE_ENTRY(Exchange::IPowerManager)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: PowerManagerMock & Mock()
methods.description: unavailable
